item.title: Confidence is a trap. Attention is the Currency of Performance.
item.description: As someone who used to be super focused on setting and achieving goals, at the expense of impacting my mental health and well-being, learning how to be more present and resilient has become my priority. I’m done being a slave driver and beating myself up when things don’t work out as I want (or as I want and fear of success kicks in). That’s why I loved this series about achievement orientation from the First Person Plural podcast.
